name: US States and Postal areas in GeoJSON
title: US States and Postal areas in GeoJSON
tool_name: US States and Postal areas in GeoJSON

api_list.name: Get US states in GeoJSON format
api_list.description: Get US states in GeoJSON format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-states-and-postal-areas-in-geojson.p.rapidapi.com/states.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-states-and-postal-areas-in-geojson.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Postal areas of specific US state in GeoJSON format
api_list.description: Get Postal areas of specific US state in GeoJSON format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-states-and-postal-areas-in-geojson.p.rapidapi.com/postal-areas/ca/geometry.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-states-and-postal-areas-in-geojson.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-states-and-postal-areas-in-geojson.p.rapidapi.com/postal-areas/{state}/geometry.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-states-and-postal-areas-in-geojson.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
